data.author: Bloomberg
data.title: India’s options traders rethink strategies for the calmest stock market in the world
data.description: Volatility is the engine of derivatives trading: when markets swing, investors pay up to hedge, and the cost of contracts rise
data.content:
Indias stock market has become one of the calmest in the world so calm that its prompting a rethink of strategies among players in the countrys vast derivatives space.
Despite geopolitical flare ups… [+3553 chars]
